Network Infrastructure and Information Security Services Account Manager

A tidal wave of regulation, increasingly sophisticated threats and the relentless data demands of an information economy have transformed information security from an afterthought to perhaps the most complex and urgent business concern for many organizations. Companies must achieve and maintain the right balance between managing risks and enable the business. TEKsystems Information Security Services Include:1. Identity and Access Management2. Threat and Vulnerability Management3. Governance, Risk and ComplianceAdditionally, in the industry, we are noticing that businesses are increasingly undertaking network infrastructure initiatives to improve efficiencies and lower costs. Leaders require IT professionals to help drive and support goals related to storage, virtualization, Unified Communications and security. That is where we play a part in minimizing the gap between IT demands and a proactive workforce solution.

recommendations: Zachary Buckholz
Senior System Developer at Pearson Learning Solutions
September 16, 2015, Zachary was a client of Margo’s

Margo is a very social and well liked recruiter. She has broken the mould of the typical recruiter, and change my perception. In the 20 years I have been engaged with recruiters, and contract assignments I grew very jaded of the typical recruiter. Just another sales person trying to sell something, and me being the product. This is definitely not Margo!Margo is very personably and sincere. Sincere being the key here; as most recruiters are based on commission and have little time unless it's to their advantage. Absolutely not the case with Margo. She's an amazing outgoing person, I told her my requirements and she helped place me with a company I absolutely love working for. Margo regularly follows up; not to ask if I am looking for other opportunities as many recruiters do, but to see if there is anything she can do to improve herself. Several months ago Margo contacted me asking some blunt questions about my perception of the recruiting industry in general. I gave answers just as blunt. I think the word used car sales men came up a few times; but again this is NOT how Margo conducts herself. I trust Margo 100%. Margo brings a completely different level to the field, it's not even the same game when she's involved. It's like creating a life long partnership instead of just a placement.

I have come to know Margo as a consistently positive-thinking, energetic and cheerful recruiter.  As she was looking to place me through TEKsystems, she continued to remain upbeat and persistently looked for additional opportunities that would fit my skills, even when some did not work out. I would definitely recommend someone looking to find a new position in IT to contact Margo, who will work with you and also put you in touch with her excellent account representatives.

summary: Staying positive is the key to success. I hope to continue to share my optimistic energy to change the lives of others by helping to bridge the gap between business demands and IT resource planning. Email: medris@teksystems.comPhone: 602-605-7043Specialties: Establishing and maintaining customer relationships.- TEKsystems® is the nation’s leading technology staffing and services company. Combining a proven track record of superior performance, a quality-focused approach to service delivery, and the highest-caliber technical professionals in the market, TEKsystems helps our clients successfully plan, build, and run their critical technology initiatives.- With more than 25 years of experience, we annually deploy 70,000 technical professionals from 90 locations throughout North America, Europe, and Asia. Our capabilities include IT and communications staff augmentation and direct placement services; managed, project-based, and outsourced applications and infrastructure services; education services; and comprehensive workforce management solutions.TEKsystems core capabilities:1. Staffing Solutions - We find and secure the right people for the job at hand.2. Talent Management Expertise - We provide guidance to optimize how our clients manage their IT workforce.3. Global Services - We offer specific IT services based on what we have seen consistently work, and that address critical business goals.Specialties:We offer a wide variety of IT Global Services including turn-key infrastructure deployments, asset disposal, asset inventories, IT training, QA testing, applications development (On-Shore/Off-Shore and Near Shore) and augmented staffing solutions.
